plot: The paths of two starkly different men, a generation apart, converge late one evening for them to discover they have a dark and destructive bond.
title: The Southern Belle
plot_es: The paths of two starkly different men, a generation apart, converge late one evening for them to discover they have a dark and destructive bond.
plot_en: The paths of two starkly different men, a generation apart, converge late one evening for them to discover they have a dark and destructive bond.
